q1_general_response: {"answer": "This image could represent a melanocytic nevus (mole), possibly a compound nevus, given the presence of both epidermal and dermal components. The presence of hairs within the lesion is common in nevi."}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "The lesion exhibits a range of brown hues, with some areas appearing darker than others. The borders seem relatively well-defined in some sections but fade or blur in others. There appears to be asymmetry in both color distribution and border definition. These characteristics could indicate a melanocytic lesion with potential for irregular growth or pigmentation, warranting further investigation to rule out malignancy."}
